attributes.action: fight for the rights of the working people. stop benefit cheats. stop rewarding non workers
attributes.additional_details: Again in news  non working mother of 11 children is being rewarded with £400,000 house. People who work struggling to get on property ladder. Benefit cheats not being fully investigsted.e.g No I'm single, I don't live with a partner when half the world know they do. But entitled to more benefits when living on own and having children. Why are workers struggling, when people on benefits aren't
